# data(using:allowLossyConversion:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a `Data` containing a representation of the `String` encoded using a given encoding.

## Declaration

```swift
func data(using encoding: String.Encoding, allowLossyConversion: Bool = false) -> Data?
```
title: data(using:allowLossyConversion:)
